videos.headline: Bryant finds Cain for 53-yard TD
videos.description: Clemson's big play wide receiver Deon Cain hauls in a 53-yard TD pass from Kelly Bryant in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Clemson's Etienne walks in for TD
videos.description: Travis Etienne scores easily from 6 yards out for the Tigers in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Renfrow takes screen for TD
videos.description: Clemson's Hunter Renfrow evades defenders on his way for a 12-yard score as the Tigers pour it on.

videos.headline: Clemson's Bryant throws 3rd TD
videos.description: Kelly Bryant connects with T.J. Chase for a 13-yard touchdown pass in the second quarter for the Tigers.

videos.headline: Clemson's Cooper extends play for big gain
videos.description: QB Zerrick Cooper overcomes a bad snap, evades a defender, and then throws for a 39-yard gain.

videos.headline: Clemson's Higgins makes circus catch for TD
videos.description: QB Zerrick Cooper finds wide receiver Tee Higgins, who makes a difficult catch in the end zone for a 32-yard touchdown for the Tigers.

videos.headline: Clemson's Feaster scampers 61 yards for TD
videos.description: Tavien Feaster runs through the heart of the Bulldogs defense for a 61-yard touchdown run in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Clemson's Etienne scores second rushing TD
videos.description: Travis Etienne's second touchdown of the game goes for 7 yards, as the Tigers continue to dominate.

videos.headline: Higgins makes one-handed catch down sideline for TD
videos.description: Clemson's Tee Higgins makes a beautiful one-handed catch, walks the tightrope to stay in bounds, and takes it 78 yards for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Tigers defense forces turnover
videos.description: Bulldogs QB Jordan Black is intercepted by Clemson's Shaq Smith in the fourth quarter.
